item.title: robinmap
item.author: nicolas.casajus@fondationbiodiversite.fr (FRB-CESAB)
item.description: The goal of the R package robinmap is to map World countries in the Robinson projection system (or others CRS) centered on a different meridian than Greenwich. It uses the Natural Earth layer as a base map.
